channel.title: Papers on Luca Rossi
channel.description: Recent content in Papers on Luca Rossi

item.title: How Socio-Political Events Shape Consumption: Evidence from Music Streaming
item.description: This study explores how Brett Kavanaugh’s Supreme Court confirmation influenced music consumption in the U.S., revealing a notable increase in streams for female artists on Spotify during the politically charged period of September–November 2018.

item.title: Picture Perfect? The Impact of Images in Second-Hand Marketplaces
item.description: This article investigates the role of images in influencing sales in second-hand marketplaces.

item.title: Country Music: Strategic Incentives of Competing Voters
item.description: This article analyzes the strategic robustness of positional voting systems using Eurovision Song Contest data. Our findings reveal strategic voting behaviors, particularly among jury members, influenced by information from the semifinal stage rather than the quality of the songs.
